actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services

official_title: A bill to enable the State of Rhode Island to meet the criteria for recommendation as an Area of Application to the Boston-Worcester-Lawrence; Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Maine, and Connecticut Federal locality pay area.
short_title: Rhode Island Federal Worker Fairness Act of 1999

summary.text: Rhode Island Federal Worker Fairness Act of 1999 - Amends provisions regarding locality-based comparability payments for Federal employees to consider the five counties of Rhode Island (including Providence, Bristol, Newport, Kent, and Washington counties) as one county, adjacent to the Boston-Worcester-Lawrence, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Maine, and Connecticut locality pay area and the Hartford, Connecticut, locality pay area (thus meeting the criteria for recommendation as an Area of Application to the Boston-Worcester-Lawrence, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Maine, and Connecticut locality pay area).

titles.title: Rhode Island Federal Worker Fairness Act of 1999

A bill to enable the State of Rhode Island to meet the criteria for recommendation as an Area of Application to the Boston-Worcester-Lawrence; Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Maine, and Connecticut Federal locality pay area.
